content:
I've scheduled a block vote on a bunch of Questionnaire-related topics for teh FHIR-I call in one week. Holler if you want any of them pulled for discussion on our Thursday Questionnaire calls:
18298 Spec+mentions+Form+Manager+where+it+should+say+Form+Filler (Paul Lynch) Not Persuasive
19452 Elements+in+profiles+need+short+labels+for+easy+reference (Liz Amos) Not Persuasive
18812 Purpose+of+questionnaire-choiceColumn+with+initialValue+is+unclear (Paul Lynch) In Person Not Persuasive with Mod
17814 Link+to+SDC+project+wiki+is+outdated (Paul Lynch) Persuasive
17817 History+page+needs+an+update (Paul Lynch) Persuasive
18984 Adaptive+Questionnaire+example+data+not+correct (Ye Wang) Persuasive
19260 Missing+extension+does+not+have+a+description+-+SDC+%233 (Sean McIlvenna) In Person Persuasive
19319 Please+provide+an+example+of+Adaptive+Quesionnaire.+-+PRO+%233 (Zabrina Gonzaga) Persuasive
19430 add+extension-timeLimit (Eric Haas) Persuasive
18259 questionnaire-optionExclusive+vs+questionnaire-maxOccurs+%3D+1%3F (Paul Lynch) In Person Persuasive with Mod
18811 Return+value+of+sdc-questionnaire-contextExpression+is+vague (Paul Lynch) In Person Persuasive with Mod
19258 Be+realistic+about+what+SDC+can+do+-+SDC+%231 (John Roberts) Persuasive with Mod

I guess I am not familiar with the process of block votes, but I would have expected a block vote on questionnaire items to be voted on during the Thursday Questionnaire calls rather than a "FHIR-I" call. I am not objecting, but just confused.
We could do it on our Thursday calls instead, though if we do that, it should actually be next Thursday's call to allow a minimum of 1 week of review time.

GF#18298 Spec+mentions+Form+Manager+where+it+should+say+Form+Filler (Paul Lynch) Not Persuasive
GF#19452 Elements+in+profiles+need+short+labels+for+easy+reference (Liz Amos) Not Persuasive
GF#18812 Purpose+of+questionnaire-choiceColumn+with+initialValue+is+unclear (Paul Lynch) In Person Not Persuasive with Mod
GF#17814 Link+to+SDC+project+wiki+is+outdated (Paul Lynch) Persuasive
GF#17817 History+page+needs+an+update (Paul Lynch) Persuasive
GF#18984 Adaptive+Questionnaire+example+data+not+correct (Ye Wang) Persuasive
GF#19260 Missing+extension+does+not+have+a+description+-+SDC+%233 (Sean McIlvenna) In Person Persuasive
GF#19319 Please+provide+an+example+of+Adaptive+Quesionnaire.+-+PRO+%233 (Zabrina Gonzaga) Persuasive
GF#19430 add+extension-timeLimit (Eric Haas) Persuasive
GF#18259 questionnaire-optionExclusive+vs+questionnaire-maxOccurs+%3D+1%3F (Paul Lynch) In Person Persuasive with Mod
GF#18811 Return+value+of+sdc-questionnaire-contextExpression+is+vague (Paul Lynch) In Person Persuasive with Mod
GF#19258 Be+realistic+about+what+SDC+can+do+-+SDC+%231 (John Roberts) Persuasive with Mod

for GF#19452 I think the proposed dispo does not address the question of short labels for profile elements

e.g.

 </element>
    <element id="Questionnaire.useContext:context-gender.code.system">
      <path value="Questionnaire.useContext.code.system"/>
      <short value="Identity of the terminology system"/>

ElementDefinition.label already meets this need not item.label as stated in the dispo.
@Lloyd McKenzie ping for GF#19452
I'ved dropped it from the block vote. We'll try to discuss this Thur.
@Lloyd McKenzie What is the current list for the block vote?
Shown on the call where we approved it
